brainly_data.question:
The decline in U.S. manufacturing was balanced by all of the following, except?

a.
technology.
c.
computers.
b.
pharmaceuticals.
d.
agriculture.
brainly_data.subject: History

all_answers.question:

all_answers.subject: History
all_answers.text:
d.
agriculture

There is only branch among mentioned that didn't expended in employment market all other three was developing fast and become vita for U.S economy
